Dictionary.description:
-- Definition -- The status of a geographical name, that is the information enabling to discern which credit should be given to the name with respect to its standardisation and/or its topicality.
-- Description -- NOTE The precise definition of the values 'Official', 'Standardised', 'Historical' and 'Other' can only be decided by Member States according to their legislation and practice.

Definition.description: -- Definition -- Name in current use and officially approved or established by legislation.
Definition.name: official

Definition.description: -- Definition -- Name in current use and accepted or recommended by a body assigned advisory function and/or power of decision in matters of toponymy.
Definition.name: standardised

Definition.description: -- Definition -- Historical name not in current use.
Definition.name: historical

Definition.description: -- Definition -- Current, but not official, nor approved name.
Definition.name: other
